io.github.samwright.framework.model.common

Interface Controllable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Element, Processor, TopProcessor, Workflow, WorkflowContainer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractElement, AbstractProcessor, AbstractWorkflow, AbstractWorkflowContainer, Adder, ChooserWorkflowContainer, ContourFinder, ExContainer, FingertipFinder, FingertipReducer, HandDetector, ImageLoader, KeyboardActor, MockElement, NNClassifier, Optimiser, PalmDetector, SimplifyContour, SkinDetector, SplitJoinWorkflowContainer, StartElement, StaticColourRange, TopWorkflowContainer, Viewer, WorkflowImpl

    public interface Controllable
    A class whose instantiations can each have a controller.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ModelController getController()
      Gets the controller for this object.
      void setController(ModelController modelController)
      Set the controller for this object, which is notified of replacements to this object.

    • Method Detail

      • setController

        void setController(ModelController modelController)
        Set the controller for this object, which is notified of replacements to this object.

        If future versions of this object already exist, they will all now use modelController as their controller, and the controller will use this as its current model.

        Parameters:
        modelController - the controller for this object.

      • getController

        ModelController getController()
        Gets the controller for this object.
        Returns:
        the controller for this object.
